title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Online Explicit Systematic Instruction for English Prosody Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand the fundamental principles of English phonemic awareness and perform phoneme segmentation and blending exercises with over 85% accuracy.

Learners apply a three-stage metacognitive learning strategy (Plan-Execute-Evaluate) based on explicit systematic instruction to real-world scenarios (e.g., patient education, team briefings), and produce execution results that meet four or more of five checklist items in 80% or more of the scenarios.
Periodically diagnose phonological awareness using formative assessment tools within the LMS and achieve over 20% improvement in speech recognition accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
